VISUAL_ACTIVE_EFFECTS.SETTINGS.FONT_SIZE: Change the font size of the text in the effects. Default: 16.
VISUAL_ACTIVE_EFFECTS.SETTINGS.HIDE_DISA: If enabled, any disabled effects will not show up.
VISUAL_ACTIVE_EFFECTS.SETTINGS.HIDE_PASS: If enabled, any passive effects will not show up.
VISUAL_ACTIVE_EFFECTS.SETTINGS.ICON_SIZE: Change the pixel size of the icons. Default: 50.
VISUAL_ACTIVE_EFFECTS.SETTINGS.MENU.NAME: UI Configuration
VISUAL_ACTIVE_EFFECTS.SETTINGS.PLAYER_CL: If unchecked, non-GM users will not be able to toggle or delete effects directly in the panel.
VISUAL_ACTIVE_EFFECTS.SETTINGS.TOP_OFFSE: Change the space between the panel of effects and the top of the window. Default: 16.

VISUAL_ACTIVE_EFFECTS.Inclusion.Title: Inclusion: {name}
VISUAL_ACTIVE_EFFECTS.Inclusion.Label: Inclusion
VISUAL_ACTIVE_EFFECTS.Inclusion.Hint: Select whether to force include or exclude this effect from the top-right effects panel.
